main.name: James Harris
main.desc: I am regarded by my peers as a relentless pursuer of knowledge and wisdom. Learning new skills and pushing my limits through hard work and innovation are when I am at my best. Read on to find out how I could be of service to you.
main.bio: Arcangyl Studios (AS) is simply... James Harris. Founded as a freelance design co-op in Huntsville, Alabama in the mid 1990's, AS is now a one-man web development studio based out of Atlanta, Georgia. After 20 plus years in the Information Technology field working for magazine and newspaper publishers, Mr. Harris has transitioned into web development and UX/UI design. Mr. Harris is currently enrolled as a participant in the Full Stack Flex Bootcamp course through the Georgia Institute of Technology. Here he is gaining knowledge on fundamental skills such as HTML, CSS, Javascript, JQuery, Node.js, and more. With these skills he hopes to improve and add to his body of work produced thus far.
main.contactMsg: Feel free to contact me at the address on phone number listed below.

resume.skillmessage: Listed below are my skills in regards to Front End, Back End, and Databases.

education.description: Six-month immersive coding bootcamp covering MERN full-stack development.
Completed 4 year degree program in graphic design with minor studies in marketing.

work.title: IT Digital Support and Web Development
Site Integration Project Manager
work.description: MEI was a software developer with a suite of applications for use in the newspaper and magazine publishing industry. I managed projects to install the application systems at newspaper and magazine sites around the U.S. I also conducted the end-user training for production staff at these locations on using the applications and systems. I usually managed an integration crew of 3 to 4 people.
